creator: david_witherspoon@adp.com
text:
This is probably more of a "heads up" than a true bug...perhaps it's something 
worth noting in the manual.

In the SourceSafe UI, there is a setting accessed via Tools->Options-
>GeneralTab called "Act on projects recursively".  If this setting is checked, 
then the recursive attribute on the vssget task is effectively ignored, and the 
get will always be done recursively.
